front.title: IEEE Guide for Online Monitoring and Recording Systems for Transient Overvoltages in Electric Power Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The guide for the online monitoring and recording system of transient overvoltages in power system is used to regularize its methods, define the concrete structure of recording system for transient overvoltages, and identify the requirements of capability checkout and uncertainty in online monitoring and recording systems.
